summary: Utility class that supplies a collection of tensor‑manipulation helpers for the FunnelRelMultiheadAttention module, including getters for positional embeddings, initialization of attention inputs, various pre‑ and post‑attention pooling operations, stride‑based pooling, relative position calculations, and conversion of token type IDs into matrix form.
business_intent: Facilitate hierarchical, funnel‑shaped attention processing in natural‑language models to handle long sequences more efficiently, reducing computational cost while preserving contextual information.
